This ancillary study serve quality control ( QC ) measure ongoing DCEG Prostate Tissue Study ( ORSH # : OH99-C-N025 ; principal investigator : Dr. Ann Hsing ) high-quality assay choose quantify steroid tissue . Pending satisfactory performance serum , evaluate reproducibility tissue hormone measurement Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry ( GC-MS ) Liquid Chromatography - Mass Spectrometry- ( GC-MS ) Liquid Chromatography- Mass Spectrometry- Mass Spectrometry ( LC-MS-MS ) incorporate Prostate Tissue Study . The second component study involve evaluation reproducibility sex steroid hormone measurement pre- postmenopausal woman . This component , although part Prostate Tissue Study , include summary laboratory , assay method , blood collection procedure use female component identical male component two component run parallel . The present study evaluate reproducibility serum sex steroid assay use two different assay method different laboratory . Specifically , study investigate assay reproducibility Dr. Fernand Labrie 's laboratory use GC-MS LC-MSMS Dr. Frank Stanczyk 's laboratory use radioimmunoassay ( RIA ) . We propose collect overnight fast blood 60 healthy subject ( 20 men age 50-65 , 20 premonopausal woman , 20 postmenopausal woman ) . Once collect , blood separate aliquotted multiple vial . Serum subject send Dr. Labrie , perform CG-MS LC-MSMS assay , Dr. Stanczyk , perform RIA , four different time interval . Subject recruitment blood collection perform Westat .
